QuestData.Title: Fresh From The Hills
QuestData.Description: Ice this time? Hoo boy, sure. I've got good news and bad news for you.$B$BThe good news is there's a bunch of pure solid ice over in the Ice Thistle Hills cavern, straight east from Everlook. The bad news is there's also a bunch of vicious yetis in there.$B$BBut if you can handle the yeti, hey, piece of cake! Just walk right up to the bigger chunks and crack 'em open with your weapon. Bring it all back to me and I'll do my thing.
QuestData.LogDescription: Collect 7 Pieces of Pure Glacier Ice from the cavern in Icethistle Hills.
QuestData.CompletionText: Oh, you're back! How were the yetis?
QuestData.RewardText: Not bad! Let's hope they don't ask for lava or something next, right?
